data.title: Plum 2% Encapsulated Salicylic Acid Face Serum | Fights Acne, Controls Oil & Soothes Inflammation | Lightweight & Fast Absorbing | For All Skin Types | 10 ml
data.description:
The Plum 2% Encapsulated Salicylic Acid Face Serum (10 ml) is specially formulated to target acne while keeping your skin calm and balanced. Powered by 2% encapsulated salicylic acid, this serum penetrates deep into pores to clear congestion, reduce active breakouts, and help prevent future acne.

The encapsulated technology ensures a slow and controlled release, delivering effective results with minimal irritation. It also helps regulate excess oil production, reduce shine, and soothe redness and inflammation associated with acne-prone skin.
data.meta_title: Plum 2% Salicylic Acid Face Serum – Acne & Oil Control
data.meta_description: The Plum 2% Encapsulated Salicylic Acid Face Serum helps fight active acne, unclog pores, and control excess oil. Its lightweight, fast-absorbing formula soothes inflammation and is suitable for all skin types, for both women and men.
data.meta_keywords: Plum salicylic acid serum, 2% salicylic acid face serum, acne control serum, face serum for acne, oil control serum, salicylic acid serum for oily skin,

data.title: Streax Vitamin C Face Serum 30 ml | 18% Vitamin C | Dark Spots Reduction | Bright & Glowing Skin in 3 Days | Brightening & Shine Serum
data.description:
The Streax Vitamin C Face Serum (30 ml) is a powerful brightening solution designed to give you visibly glowing and radiant skin. Formulated with 18% Vitamin C, this serum helps reduce dark spots, pigmentation, and uneven skin tone while enhancing your skin’s natural luminosity.

Its lightweight and fast-absorbing formula penetrates deeply into the skin, delivering active ingredients without leaving a greasy or sticky feel. With regular use, it helps improve skin texture, boost radiance, and reveal brighter skin in as little as 3 days.

18% Pure Vitamin C Power – Enriched with high-strength Vitamin C to visibly reduce dark spots, pigmentation, and dullness for brighter, even-toned skin.

Brighter Skin in Just 3 Days – Helps boost natural glow and radiance quickly with regular use, giving your skin a fresh and luminous look.

Lightweight & Fast Absorbing Formula – Non-sticky, oil-free texture absorbs easily into the skin without clogging pores, perfect for daily use.

Improves Skin Texture & Glow – Enhances skin clarity, smoothness, and overall brightness while revitalizing tired and dull skin.

Suitable for All Skin Types – Ideal for men and women; can be used morning and night as part of your regular skincare routine.
data.meta_title: Streax Vitamin C Face Serum – 18% Vitamin C for Glowing Skin
data.meta_description: The Streax Vitamin C Face Serum is enriched with 18% Vitamin C to help reduce dark spots and boost natural radiance. Its lightweight, fast-absorbing formula delivers brighter, glowing skin in just 3 days, making it perfect for daily skincare and a visibly fresh, even-toned look.
data.meta_keywords: Streax vitamin C serum, vitamin C face serum, face serum for glowing skin, dark spots removal serum, brightening face serum,

data.title: Lacto Calamine 10% Niacinamide Face Serum | Pore Minimizing & Oil Balancing | 30ml
data.description: The Lacto Calamine 10% Niacinamide Face Serum (30ml) is a powerful yet gentle skincare solution designed to improve skin texture and clarity. Formulated with 10% Niacinamide, this serum works effectively to minimize pores, balance excess oil, and reduce acne marks, blemishes, and pigmentation, making it ideal for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin.
data.meta_title: Lacto Calamine 10% Niacinamide Serum 30ml | Acne Marks, Pores & Pigmentation Care
data.meta_description: Lacto Calamine 10% Niacinamide Face Serum helps minimize pores, control excess oil, and reduce acne marks, blemishes, and pigmentation. Dermatologically tested and fragrance-free, suitable for both women and men.
data.meta_keywords: Lacto Calamine niacinamide serum, 10 percent niacinamide serum, face serum for women and men, pore minimizing serum,

data.title: Dot & Key Vitamin C + E Sorbet Super Bright Moisturizer for Face | Oil Free & Lightweight | 60ml
data.description: The Dot & Key Vitamin C + E Sorbet Super Bright Moisturizer for Face (60ml) is a refreshing, oil-free, and lightweight face moisturizer designed to brighten dull skin and enhance natural radiance. Enriched with the goodness of Vitamin C and Vitamin E, this moisturizer helps reduce uneven skin tone, fight dullness, and provide long-lasting hydration without making the skin greasy.
data.meta_title: Dot & Key Vitamin C + E Face Moisturizer 60ml | Brightening & Oil Free Cream
data.meta_description: Dot & Key Vitamin C + E Sorbet Super Bright Moisturizer is an oil-free, lightweight face cream that helps reduce skin dullness, boost glow, and keep skin hydrated. Suitable for all skin types.
data.meta_keywords: Dot and Key vitamin C moisturizer, vitamin C face moisturizer, vitamin C E moisturizer, face moisturizer for glowing skin
